attributes.action: Require supermarkets and restaurants to donate food waste to charity
attributes.additional_details: The government should force supermarkets to donate unsold food to charity and food banks, as far too much food is going wasted while many are going hungry
attributes.background: In France supermarkets must donate unsold food to charity, but in the UK, Every year, 100,000 tonnes of readily available and edible food from the UK's retail and food manufacturing sector is wasted – equivalent to 250 million meals going uneaten.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319348
